name: mikroe.click.hbridge3
short_description: H-Bridge 3 Click is designed for the control of small DC motors and inductive loads, it features TLE9201SG a general purpose 6A H-Bridge perfectly suited for industrial and automotive applications. This IC meets the harsh automotive environmental conditions and it is qualified in accordance with the AEC-Q100 standard, also has set of features such as the short circuit and over-temperature protection, under-voltage protection, detailed SPI diagnosis or simple error flag and fully 3.3/5.5V compatible logic inputs.
